== Kadavallur (CT) (627760) ==

Kadavallur (CT) is a town in the [[Talappilly]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 8.73 sq. km. and harbouring 2955 households with total population of 12912 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 30 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 330 km. Male population is 6091 and female population is 6821. Scheduled Caste population is 2486 and Scheduled Tribes population is 21. Census Location Code of the town is 627760<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 30 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 110 km. Railway station is at Wadakkanchery at a distance of 15 km.
